name: Koh Tao Tropicana Resort

reviews.text: Close to Buddha Dive school, so that was good. On the other hand apparently not all that clean since my dust allergy flared up pretty badly. I asked to change the room, which made the manager extremely unhappy ("How do I know you're not going to change rooms every day now?"), but eventually she agreed. I'd definitely give this one a miss next time.
reviews.title: meh

reviews.text: I came to Koh Tao for dive trip to stay for one week, the hotel is just next door to the Islands major dive centre (Buddah View) and almost on the beach.
reviews.title: If you are lucky to get room without bedbugs, you will have nice stay!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is is very nice place. if you are here to dive. but a bit far from main pier and where all major bars and parties are.
reviews.title: Friendliest Hotel On Koh Tao

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: By the way, problem with hotel is Bedbugs!! I had almost my whole body bitten by bedbugs in 4 nights and have asked to change my room. by the way it costed me for two extra night to see Dr.
reviews.title: Chill out and relax in paradise

reviews.text: You can have option of having room with A/C or Fan, with hot water or not.
reviews.title: Nice but noisy

reviews.text: We really enjoy this hotel. The staff was very nice and helpful. The room was not the cleaness but it was spacious and quiet. We took the room without AC and we slept with the balcony door open. It was perfect!! It's not located "downtown" Koh Tao but it was near New Heaven dive shop, wich was perfect for our diving lesson. The food at the hotel was a little expensive, but it was excellent. You have to try the coco soup and fish,and of course the fried rice and pad thai.
reviews.title: Koh Tao Tropicana resort

reviews.text: I gather that there's a wide range of room types available at the Tropicana, so your mileage may vary. My room was a two bed, no a/c and no hot water for a very reasonable price for Koh Tao (I think it was about 750 baht/night). It was the only room on the third floor and had a view at the back overlooking the neighbouring dive shop and out to the sea. The view from the balcony overlooked the rest of the resort, which was also nice. Because it was on the third floor we had a good cross breeze, so we didn't really miss the a/c.
reviews.title: Paradise found

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The on-site restaurant is decent, the servers are eager and friendly. There's a good selection of other dining options within walking distance as well. The bbq red snapper at the Buddha Bar on the beach two doors down is fantastic! Cappuccino Cafe is also quite excellent for a little taste of Western food options. There's a 7/11 just off site and taxis are usually available there to take you to Mae Haad or Sairee.
reviews.title: Good accommodation in a great location for diving

reviews.text: The beach is narrow, but clean and very scenic. No loungers here. I spent my two weeks diving with Carabao next door, it was very convenient.
reviews.title: Mixed review- great location, unfortunate bathroom

reviews.text: Cleaning service is about once a week. You can get free toilet paper from the front desk if you run out. They can arrange tours and travel from there as well for rates comparative to elsewhere. They arranged my taxi, ferry, transfer and train right back to Bangkok in about 5 minutes.
reviews.title: cheap and clean

reviews.text: i travelled for about 3 month through south east asia and stopped twice in koh tao... i loved this place. the tropicana is located in chalok baan a little bit out side of the crowded places.. but there are still some cool bars around the corner.. or at the beach. take a motorbike to travel from chalok to sairee beach and back.. mae haad, go to the bakery.. love it!
reviews.title: very friendly staff

reviews.text: i had a bungalow directly in front of the reception.. it wasn't that loud, the bungalows are well sound-proofed.. the 7-11 store is right arround the corner. in total.. i recommend that place!
reviews.title: Good location in Chalok

reviews.text: The Koh Tao Tropicana is a good choice for the area. The price seemed a bit high but it's typical of the area. The rooms & bathrooms are a good size, with fan and balcony...great for drying clothes after a day of diving or swimming. Even with the fan, the room can be quite stuffy. They provide a towel and toilet paper and clean the room every four days. Not bad if you're a neat freak, but being near the beach and a spot for divers, the frequency could be raised a bit.
reviews.title: Nice but staff need some serious training

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Good accomadotion

reviews.text: I stayed here for two weeks, so if the place was bad I would not have lasted a day or two at the most. It's clean, comfy and great location. However..
reviews.title: Friendliest staff who will do anything for you!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed in one of the basic fan rooms for 4 nights while diving with Buddha View. The room was fairly basic and quite dark. The fan wasn't great and the toilet was Thai style. We were told on check in that sheets & towels were only changed every 4 days, so we didn't get a change while we were there. On the plus side it was fairly good value (around 450 BHT per night in February) and had free wifi included (wifi was a little patchy). The location was good, right on the beach with lots of decent bars and restaurants close by. The beach isn't great, but we spent most of our days diving so it didn't bother us too much. Not a bad option overall.
reviews.title: Basic rooms but good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My second visit to this hotel. My room was basic but clean, they clean every two days and change towels.
reviews.title: good value, great location

reviews.text: Gardens are clean and very nice. Great location near the beach, which is a typical Thai beach.
reviews.title: Cleanish, basic and cheap!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Some good places to eat ,drink and socialise within walking distance but not walking distance from the main Koh Tao beach.
reviews.title: Convenient, cheap and laid-back accommodation.

reviews.text: I found staff helpful and there are always pleny of them about
reviews.title: Can't decide what's worse, the rooms, location, or staff
